errors.error_description: The README vaguely states 'Robot Framework runs on Python 3' but omits the specific minimum required version (Python 3.8), which can cause installation failure on older Python 3 versions.
correction_candidates: Robot Framework requires Python 3.6 or newer.
Robot Framework requires the latest version of Python 3.
Robot Framework requires Python 3.8 or newer and runs also on `PyPy <http://pypy.org>`_.
Robot Framework is compatible with all Python 3.x versions.
errors.golden_answer: Robot Framework requires Python 3.8 or newer and runs also on `PyPy <http://pypy.org>`_.
